name: Linux Tycoon 3 - The OS Wars
description:
What if you had a video game where you could simulate the day-to-day running of your very own Linux distribution?

What if it took place in the near future and involved Tactical Nuclear Weapons, ground assaults, and Denial of Service attacks?

What if that game ran natively under both Linux and... DOS?

Welcome to Linux Tycoon 3 - The OS Wars.

One of the most ridiculous games ever built.

You can purchase Linux Tycoon 3 here, on Itch.io, for $5.  Or you can become a subscriber to The Lunduke Journal and get a copy of Linux Tycoon 3 as an added perk (along with a boatload of other games and eBooks).  The choice is yours.
